-color:blue}.context-highContrast.role-alternate.theme-default.v1 .o-group-checkBoxGroup:hover,.context-highContrast.role-alternate.theme-default.v1 .o-group-checkBoxGroup:focus,.context-highContrast.role-alternate.theme-default.v1 .o-group-checkBoxGroup.role-selected{background-color:green}}@media screen and (-ms-high-contrast:white-on-black){.theme-default.v1 .o-group-checkBoxGroup:hover,.theme-default.v1 .o-group-checkBoxGroup:focus,.theme-default.v1 .o-group-checkBoxGroup.role-selected{background-color:#3ff}}@media screen and (-ms-high-contrast:black-on-white){.theme-default.v1 .o-group-checkBoxGroup:hover,.theme-default.v1 .o-group-checkBoxGroup:focus,.theme-default.v1 .o-group-checkBoxGroup.role-selected{background-color:#306}}.theme-default.v1 .o-group-checkBoxGroup:focus{outline:none}.theme-default.v1 .o-group-checkBoxGroup.role-disabled{border:1px solid #c6c6c6}.theme-default.v1 .o-group-checkBoxGroup.role-disabled:hover{background-color:inherit}.theme-default.v1 .o-group-checkBoxGroup
